mapper.select: SELECT CHECK_NO ,SUBSTR(CHECK_NO, 0, 4) || '년' || SUBSTR(CHECK_NO, 5, 2) || '월' || SUBSTR(CHECK_NO, 7, 2) || '일' AS CHECK_NO_DATE ,B001 ,B002 ,B003 ,B004 ,B005 ,B006 ,B007 ,B008 ,SUBSTR(REG_DT, 10, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(REG_DT, 12, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(REG_DT, 14, 2) AS REG_DT ,NVL(RMK, ' ') AS RMK FROM BODY_CHECK_LIST WHERE ROWNUM <= 100 --AND B001 = '99' ORDER BY CHECK_NO DESC
SELECT BODY_KOR FROM BODY_CHECK_LIST_MAP ORDER BY BODY_CD
